languages.text: "В сражении больше нет смысла, вы уже проиграли. Бросайте оружие".
"There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."
languages.original_text: "В сражении больше нет смысла, вы уже проиграли. Бросайте оружие".

traits.locale_text: "There is no point in fighting anymore, you have already lost. Lay down your weapons."
"There is no point in fighting anymore, you have already lost. Lay down your weapons."
"There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."
"There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."
"There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."
"There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."

languages.text: «No tiene sentido seguir luchando. Ya habéis perdido. Bajad las armas».
languages.original_text: "There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: «No tiene sentido seguir luchando. Ya habéis perdido. Bajad las armas».

languages.text: 「もう戦う理由はない。既に君たちの負けだ。武器を捨てろ」
languages.original_text: "There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: 「もう戦う理由はない。既に君たちの負けだ。武器を捨てろ」

languages.text: “再打下去已经没有意义了。你们已经输了，放下你们的武器吧。”
languages.original_text: "There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: “再打下去已经没有意义了。你们已经输了，放下你们的武器吧。”

languages.text: "Es hat keinen Zweck, noch zu kämpfen. Ihr habt bereits verloren. Legt die Waffen nieder."
languages.original_text: "There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: "Es hat keinen Zweck, noch zu kämpfen. Ihr habt bereits verloren. Legt die Waffen nieder."

languages.text: « Inutile de continuer à se battre. Vous avez perdu. Déposez les armes. »
languages.original_text: "There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de continuer à se battre. Vous avez perdu. Déposez les armes. »

languages.text: "Artık savaşmanın anlamı yok. Kaybettiniz. Silahlarınızı bırakın."
languages.original_text: "There is no sense in fighting anymore. You have already lost. Lay down your weapons."
